Name: disc party
About the game: Disc Party is an online multiplayer disc golf arcade game. Compete with your friends on windy, procedurally generated islands and find out who's the best disc golfer! Throw discs and use boosters to your advantage to reach the goal, but watch out for the heavy winds and cold ocean. Features Play online with up to 6 people on procedurally generated islands Play alone in single player high score mode Compete with other players on the daily level mode Controls WASD to move and control disc mid-flight Space to jump E to interact Mouse to aim & throw Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
